name: Aw Rats
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 45 in which you play as Ratthew the rat in a rogue-like game.

Controls:

arrow keys to move, space to attack, e to use bomb

Notes:

You must wait until the world is fully generated or else the game may crash.

We had little time for many animations so the only indication that you are doing damage is the enemy's health bar.

Sometimes edge rooms don't generate allowing for free roam, please ignore these exits.

the goal is to kill 5 enemies and exit the game through the portal that spawns in the spawn room.

There is a 1 second cool down to attacking.

sometimes a room without a door generates next to a room with a door and because planes only render on one side it looks like there is a hall when there isn't one.

I apologize for the large number of bugs.
